content: Is there an equivalent of fdifferential of a smooth manifold map that actually maps to the tangent_space, instead of point_derivation? The problem I'm facing is that I need to take a second fdifferential, but the first fdifferential maps to point_derivation I x ‚Üí‚Çó[ùïú] point_derivation I (f x), which doesn't yet have a manifold structure. point_derivation is also not conveniently identified with the original manifold model vector space like tangent_space is.
